name: aichat (sigoden)
description: [项目级] All-in-one LLM CLI tool featuring Shell Assistant, Chat-REPL, RAG, AI Tools & Agents, with access to OpenAI, Claude, Gemini, Ollama, Groq, and more.。来源: https://github.com/sigoden/aichat

genes.title: 项目概述
genes.content:
All-in-one LLM CLI tool featuring Shell Assistant, Chat-REPL, RAG, AI Tools & Agents, with access to OpenAI, Claude, Gemini, Ollama, Groq, and more.

来源: https://github.com/sigoden/aichat
语言: Rust
Stars: 9334

genes.title: 项目结构
genes.content:
Argcfile.sh
Cargo.lock
Cargo.toml
LICENSE-APACHE
LICENSE-MIT
README.md
assets
assets/arena.html
assets/monokai-extended-light.theme.bin
assets/monokai-extended.theme.bin
assets/playground.html
assets/roles
assets/syntaxes.bin
config.agent.example.yaml
config.example.yaml
models.yaml
scripts
scripts/completions
scripts/shell-integration
src

name: aichat/assets 模块
description: [模块级] aichat 项目的 assets 模块 (source)。来源: https://github.com/sigoden/aichat

genes.title: assets 模块说明
genes.content:
模块路径: assets/
类型: source
文件数: 12

包含文件:
- assets/arena.html
- assets/monokai-extended-light.theme.bin
- assets/monokai-extended.theme.bin
- assets/playground.html
- assets/roles
- assets/roles/%code%.md
- assets/roles/%create-prompt%.md
- assets/roles/%create-title%.md
- assets/roles/%explain-shell%.md
- assets/roles/%functions%.md
